bibl.title: Observaciones sobre los papiros Chester Beatty IV y V (961 y 962) (Gen. VIII 13-XLVI 33).
bibl.note: P. Chester Beatty IV; V (= van Haelst 8; 7). "The authors have made a complete revision of the above mentioned papyri, have corrected some errors and have discussed certain points of Kenyon's edition."
bibl.seg: Galiano Manuel Fernández y Luis Gil, Observaciones sobre los papiros Chester Beatty IV y V (961 y 962) (Gen. VIII 13-XLVI 33).
